lead_paragraph: BRIORDY--Dennis Sr.,on February 20. Beloved father of Dennis (Andrea) Mary-Beth (Patrick) Lilies and the late Darren. Proud grandfather of Devin Jules, Brooke, AJ, Alexa, Ava, Alura, and Cheyenne. Loving brother of Michael. Formerly of Brooklyn and now a Melville resident. Vietnam Army Veteran and member of the VFW Huntington Post. New York Times employee of over 40 years. Visiting Tuesday at Commack Abbey Funeral Home, 96 Commack Road, Commack, NY, 2-4pm and 7-9pm, Mass of Christian Burial Christ the King, Wednesday, 10am. Cremation Private to follow. Donations may be made to: St. Jude Children's Hospital. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BRIORDY, DENNIS SR.
